akas: The Listener - Der Gedankenjäger Germany (DVD title)
akas from release info: The Listener - Der Gedankenjäger Germany (DVD title)

1.title: The Wrong Man
1.plot: Toby and Michelle go after a murder that contains the same circumstances as those of a case Michelle worked on years ago. Is this a copycat murder or was the murderer Michelle put away innocent?

2.title: The Lockup
2.plot: The team meets their new leader, a man Toby met before and it was not good encounter. They investigate how money that is suppose to be in the evidence locker ended up in sport team's locker room.

3.title: Dancing with the Enemy
3.plot: Tia's supposed to interview the star dancer of a dance company about maleficence in the company. When she goes there, she's gone and her room is wrecked. She goes to Toby and tells him about her disappearance. Becker is not exactly willing to investigate but they find signs of a struggle in the room. They talk to her husband who is the company's artistic director and Toby senses he's having an affair and is abusive to his wife.

4.title: Smoke and Mirrors
4.plot: At a magic club, a magician who is performing asks a member of the audience to come on stage and help him with his next trick. But something goes wrong and the man is killed. The team is sent to investigate because the man who was killed is a multi millionaire and part owner of the club. When they examine the apparatus that was used in the trick, they see it was tampered with. So they try to find out who wanted the man dead. And Becker learns about Toby's ability.

5.title: Game Over
5.plot: Dev learns that an old friend who is a game designer was killed. So the team investigates. When talking to his people, they say he was a good guy but Toby senses that they are keeping things. Like he was having a disagreement with some associates and he was having an affair.

6.title: Man in the Mirror
6.plot: Toby faces a mentally unstable suspect in the murder investigation of a psychiatrist.

7.title: Amuse Bouche
7.plot: A cooking-show contestant, Marcel, is poisoned by a peanut allergen on live TV. The investigation is potentially aided by someone who has a photographic memory.

8.title: White Whale
8.plot: At Becker's insistence, Toby investigates a missing campaign worker to an apparently clean mayoral candidate.

9.title: The Fugitive
9.plot: The slain father of a Special Olympics coach turns out to be directly connected to an unsolved famous coin heist.

10.title: Family Secrets
10.plot: An investigation into a slain wealthy playboy points to a girl who reads clean to Toby.

11.title: Zero Recall
11.plot: Toby loses his memory due to a drug being introduced to his system. Soon afterwards, Toby finds himself implicated in a armed kidnapping.

12.title: An Innocent Man
12.plot: A criminal is on trial and Becker is elated that they finally got him. But Michelle reminds him that this isn't the first time they thought they got him but he always seems to get off. And a man comes forth claiming to be the actual killer. Becker thinks the criminal somehow made the man come forth and confess. While he and Michelle try to find out how the criminal got him to come forth and confess, Toby is sent to the prison where the man to find out. And Toby senses that the man's wife may have been threatened. But the wife denies it.

13.title: In Our Midst
13.plot: When evidence points to Becker being a dirty cop, the team uncovers a conspiracy of judges and cops that puts them all in danger. Tia uncovers a part of Toby's past.

1.title: I'm an Adult Now
1.plot: After rescuing a young woman (Kristen Hager) from a fiery car crash, Toby (Craig Olejnik) is troubled by visions of her missing son. Clearly traumatized and frightened by her son's abduction, Toby is unable to get her to share any information. And as his own fears for the child's well-being increase, he realizes he's going to have to act quickly to make sense of the mental dissonance that plagues him.

2.title: Emotional Rescue
2.plot: After saving a childhood friend from a burning building, Toby (Craig Olejnik) tracks town an arsonist that he believes might be responsible for a series of fires in the city.

3.title: A Voice in the Dark
3.plot: Toby (Craig Olejnik) encounters a street person who may hold the key to locating a missing girl.

4.title: Some Kinda Love
4.plot: After meeting a young woman at a nightclub who is later found dead, Toby (Craig Olejnik) is considered the prime suspect and must clear his name.

5.title: Lisa Says
5.plot: When Toby (Craig Olejnik) saves a teenage boy from a gang beating, he learns that a series of drug store robberies may be linked to the runaway's turbulent past.

6.title: Foggy Notion
6.plot: After a shooting in Chinatown, Toby (Craig Olejnik) helps a blind woman solve the murder of her brother, who may have been involved in illegal activity.

7.title: Iris
7.plot: Toby (Craig Olejnik) connects with a young faith healer whose miraculous gift has put her life in jeopardy.

8.title: One Way or Another
8.plot: Toby's intuition that there may be something more to Detective Charlie Marks' pursuit of a serial rapist brings them closer.

9.title: Inside the Man
9.plot: Detective Charlie Marks enlists Toby to use his telepathic abilities on a traumatized teenager who witnessed the murder of his parents.

10.title: Missing
10.plot: Toby (Craig Olejnik) investigates a missing person case hoping the $100,000 reward will save Oz's (Ennis Esmer) parents from losing their home

11.title: Beginning to See the Light
11.plot: When Toby's (Craig Olejnik) patient dies after a hit-and-run, he discovers the man was convicted of embezzling four million dollars and his death wasn't an accident.

12.title: My Sister's Keeper
12.plot: Toby's (Craig Olejnik) paramedic skills are questioned when, while trying to save the victim's life, he disturbs a crime scene.

13.title: The Journey
13.plot: Toby (Craig Olejnik) learns that "John Doe" (Gordon Pinsent) an unidentified patient suffering from Alzheimer's could be linked to his past and that his dead mother may be alive.

1.title: Lady in the Lake
1.plot: Toby (Craig Olejnik) helps a woman with amnesia regain her memory, which includes some unsavory corporate behaviours. But his actions draw the attention and suspicions of Sgt. Michelle McCluskey (Lauren Lee Smith) at the IIB.

2.title: Crime Seen
2.plot: McCluskey (Lauren Lee Smith) recruits Toby (Craig Olejnik) on a case involving smuggled weapons, which takes a turn for the worse when an undercover operative winds up dead.

3.title: In His Sights
3.plot: As a new confidential informant for the IIB, Toby investigates an assassination threat against a Conservative leadership front-runner who may have been involved in the mysterious disappearance of an army private in Afghanistan.

4.title: The Brothers Volkov
4.plot: Toby (Craig Olejnik) and Michelle (Lauren Lee Smith) investigate a suspicious homicide when a Russian Consul General is found dead and his son, protected by diplomatic immunity, confesses to his murder.

5.title: Inner Circle
5.plot: Toby is brought in to investigate corrupt cops but finds himself in over his head when one of them ends up dead from a suspected drug overdose.

6.title: The Magician
6.plot: When an imprisoned criminal mastermind holds the key to the whereabouts of a kidnapped judge, Sgt. Michelle McCluskey brings in Toby to read him, with unexpected results.

7.title: Ace in the Hole
7.plot: The death of a CSIS agent and a breach of classified intelligence prompt Michelle to turn to her estranged husband and Toby to infiltrate a high-stakes poker game and uncover the missing puzzle pieces surrounding the mystery.

8.title: Vanished
8.plot: A mysterious woman with an unexplained psychic gift may hold the key to helping Toby uncover the whereabouts of a wealthy businessman's kidnapped baby.

9.title: Jericho
9.plot: Toby goes undercover to help expose the identity of a hacker known as "Jericho-11" in a cyber crime investigation involving large-scale identity theft.

10.title: Desperate Hours
10.plot: When Toby and Oz are dispatched to a call in the financial district, they're taken hostage by a couple posing as security guards who are carrying out a victim suffering from a gunshot wound.

11.title: To Die For
11.plot: Toby is brought in to authenticate the testimony of a star witness - a celebrated restaurant chef - in the trial of a mob boss charged with shooting his business partner.

12.title: Eye of the Storm
12.plot: Toby and the IIB investigate a national security breach when a sex tape featuring the Minister of Foreign Affairs goes viral.

13.title: Reckoning
13.plot: Toby (Craig Olejnik) connects with a gifted young woman whose mental powers appear to rival or even surpass his own, and may be connected to a series of suspicious suicides linked to an old biker gang.

1.title: The Bank Job
1.plot: Despite his decision to ignore his telepathic abilities, Toby is forced to use them when he's taken hostage during a bank robbery.

2.title: Cold Case Blues
2.plot: Working his first official investigation, Toby must contend with Alvin Klein's skepticism and personal agenda in solving a decade-old murder.

3.title: Curtain Call
3.plot: When the life of a superstar performer is threatened, Toby poses as her assistant to watch her back and help the Special Ops Unit investigate.

4.title: The Taking
4.plot: Toby helps the IIB investigate the abduction of an African teenager, whose father is an alleged war criminal.

5.title: Rogues' Gallery
5.plot: Toby uses his telepathy as surveillance when Michelle goes undercover to bust a violent art theft ring.

6.title: She Sells Sanctuary
6.plot: Toby and Michelle investigate the link between a cult and the disappearance of three young women.

7.title: Poisoned Minds
7.plot: Toby and Michelle investigate the death of a pharmaceutical executive who released a drug with killer results.

8.title: Now You See Him
8.plot: When Magnus Elphrenson escapes prison again, Toby must help Michelle recapture him before the criminal mastermind seeks vengeance on his nemesis.

9.title: Crossed
9.plot: Toby starts doubting his abilities after Michelle questions the veracity of his insights during their investigation into a wealthy philanthropist's murder.

10.title: Lockdown
10.plot: Toby and the IIB race to track the source of a deadly virus before the outbreak claims any more lives.

11.title: Captain Nightfall
11.plot: Toby and Michelle investigate a series of violent home invasions, which are being interrupted by a vigilante citizen dressed as a superhero.

12.title: The Bro Code
12.plot: Oz unwittingly puts his life in danger after he convinces Toby to help a childhood friend who witnessed a murder.

13.title: The Shooting
13.plot: With Michelle's career on the line, Toby and the IIB must prove she was set up after a bad tip led to the shooting of a suspect.

1.title: Blast from the Past
1.plot: While investigating a domestic terror case in Vancouver, Toby is taken hostage by militant activists with plans to blow up a bank.

2.title: The Blue Line
2.plot: Toby and Michelle track a gang of robbers armed with lethal, high-powered bullets under the additional pressure of a demanding new police superintendent.

3.title: Early Checkout
3.plot: Toby pushes for an investigation when his girlfriend Tia suspects her hospitalized colleague was targeted after writing a scathing exposé of an influential hotel owner.

4.title: Cold Storage
4.plot: After a body is found in a storage locker filled with stolen goods, Toby and Michelle must find the killer who may have taken national defense secrets.

5.title: Buckle Up
5.plot: Toby's puts his life at risk when he goes undercover in pursuit of violent thieves posing as police officers.

6.title: Witness for the Prosecution
6.plot: When the key witness in a mob murder trial is shot, Toby and Michelle must contend with a suspicious FBI agent as they unravel a potential conspiracy linked to the original killing and retaliation.

7.title: Caged In
7.plot: After Toby witnesses the suspicious death of a promising, young Mixed Martial Arts fighter, he probes the nefarious business dealings of two rival leagues.

8.title: The Illustrated Woman
8.plot: While investigating the murder of a mysterious tattooed woman, Toby suspects corporate espionage and blackmail are behind the killing.

9.title: Love's a Bitch
9.plot: Toby and Michelle investigate the killing of a British spy whose dalliances on an adulterous dating site might have led to his murder.

10.title: The Long Con
10.plot: In an effort to snag an elusive human trafficker, Toby and Michelle team with a career con artist.

11.title: House of Horror
11.plot: Toby and Michelle investigate the murder of an actor during the filming of an allegedly cursed horror movie.

12.title: False I.D.
12.plot: When Toby and Michelle go after a suspect in the murder of a Latin crime boss, their case is halted by interference from the police superintendent.

13.title: Fatal Vision
13.plot: After shooting and killing a suspect, Toby struggles with PTSD as the IIB tries to stop an assassination.

locations: Pinewood Toronto Studios, Port Lands, Toronto, Ontario, Canada
imdb.title: The Listener

production companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

plot: A young paramedic discovers he has telepathic powers.::Anonymous
